channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report E-2023110157
item.description:
Report E-2023110157

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-27
  • City: FARMINGTON
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 27, 2023, two (2) 1-gallon cans of UN1967 fell in transit and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EX Environmental (EX) to remediate the impacted site. EX personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted trailer floor, swept them in, and collected them with hand tools. Crews also wiped down the impacted trailer floor. The two (2) damaged cans, all spent absorbents, impacted cardboard, and any cleanup debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.
